scripts.install:landing: cd landing && npm install && npm install chonky@latest
scripts.install:2.x_docz: cd 2.x_docz && npm install && npm install chonky@canary
scripts.install:2.x_storybook: cd 2.x_storybook && npm install && npm install chonky@canary
scripts.install:2.x: npm run install:2.x_docz && npm run install:2.x_storybook
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:landing && npm run install:2.x
scripts.build:landing: cd landing && rm -rf build/ && npm run build
scripts.build:2.x_docz: cd 2.x_docz && rm -rf build/ &&  npm run build
scripts.build:2.x_storybook: cd 2.x_storybook && rm -rf build/ &&  npm run build
scripts.build:2.x: npm run build:2.x_docz && npm run build:2.x_storybook
scripts.build:all: npm run build:landing && npm run build:2.x
scripts.deploy:2.x: npm run deploy:2.x_docz && npm run deploy:2.x_storybook
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:landing && npm run deploy:2.x
